sources.title: One Body Too Many
sources.description: An insurance salesman is hired to guard the body of a man so his potential heirs don't try to bury it and invalidate the man's will. You can find out more about this film on its IMDB page .

sources.title: One Body Too Many
sources.description: Jack Haley, Bela Lugosi, Jean Parker, and Lyle Talbot in an old-dark-house film.

sources.title: One Body Too Many (1944)
sources.description: An insurance salesman, Albert Tuttle, is hired as a body guard for a millionaire. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/one-body-too-many-1944/

sources.title: One Body Too Many
sources.description: Taken from the IMDB : Insurance salesman Albert Tuttle arrives at the Cyrus J. Rutherford estate to sell the millionaire some life insurance. Rutherford is already dead and his heirs have gathered at the mansion to hear the reading of the will. Rutherford's will won't be read until he is properly entombed and the heirs are forced to stay on the premises or be denied their inheritance. Tuttle soon finds himself mixed up in shenanigans involving Rutherford's niece, secret passages, a missing body and murder.

sources.title: One Body Too Many (1944) BELA LUGOSI
sources.description:
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Jack Haley, Jean Parker 
 Director: Frank McDonald

 An insurance investigator arrives at a creepy mansion to protect a millionaire who has had death threats made against him.

sources.title: One Body Too Many (1944) Bela Lugosi | Comedy Horror High Definition with Subtitles
sources.description:
You'll SH-SH-SHIVER with SUSPENSE...and SH-SH-SHAKE with LAUGHTER!
When an insurance salesman arrives at a creepy mansion to discover his potential eccentric millionaire client already dead. Instead he gets embroiled in a house full of greedy, murderous relatives competing for the inheritance.

Original title: One Body Too Many (1944) 


Director: Frank McDonald
Writer: Winston Miller
Stars: Bela Lugosi , Jack Haley, Jean Parker
Genre: Comedy, Horror, Mystery, Psychotronic 


00:00 Full Length Movie.
02:09 Cyrus J Rutherford's last will & testament. A lawyer hires a detective to guard a body and prevent it from being buried, leading to a night of suspense.
06:14 Unexpected events unfold as Albert Tuttle mistakenly gets involved in a murder mystery at a mansion.
15:33 Mystery and chaos ensue as a detective is attacked in a dark, stormy house filled with suspicious characters.
19:15 Good Vs Evil consciousness. 
22:06 A chaotic situation unfolds as individuals suspect foul play in a missing body case during a night at a mansion.
26:05 Murder at midnight.
31:22 A comedic horror film unfolds a series of events after a body goes missing, leading to chaos and suspicion.
34:20 Wait in the coffin.
35:51 Mystery unfolds as a group searches for a missing body after a murder in a comedic horror film.
46:41 A series of mysterious events unfold, leading to suspicion and accusations of murder.
58:10 Murder mystery unravels as characters discover a hidden will and confront the killer in a suspenseful climax.

sources.title: One Body Too Many (1944; smallest download)
sources.description: Actors: Jack Haley; Bela Lugosi; Jean Parker; Lyle Talbot; Lucien Littlefield; Ralph Peters; Bernard Nedell; William Edmunds Runtime: 1:15:32 " ... my lawyer ...  whom I trust implicitly as far as I can throw an elephant." DePopper and Audacity were used to reduce noise. The Matroska (.mkv) file is the smallest download for this movie on the Archive (67 MB).

metadata.Plot: Insurance salesman Albert Tuttle arrives at the Cyrus J. Rutherford estate to sell the millionaire some life insurance. Rutherford is already dead and his heirs have gathered at the mansion to hear the reading of the will. Rutherford's will won't be read until he is properly entombed and the heirs are forced to stay on the premises or be denied their inheritance. Tuttle soon finds himself mixed up in shenanigans involving Rutherford's niece, secret passages, a missing body and murder.
metadata.Actors: Jack Haley, Jean Parker, Bela Lugosi
